p: When a new case is diagnosed, the patient should be isolated, either at home or in a hospital, depending on the level of care needed. 12 Home isolation can be controlled using technology such as GPS tracking through mobile phone applications. In addition, close contacts of confirmed cases should be quarantined and monitored daily for 14 days. 13 It is also recommended to monitor international travellers and possibly impose a 2-week quarantine for arrivals.
